long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SurfHelp is a self-hosted and private browser extension that helps you save your time during work. You can control how you spend your time but without nitpicking and unnecessary pressure. The extension tells you which apps drain the most of your data plan and turn them off when you need to. On top of that you can block websites that you want to weed out from your sight at a specific period of time.
